mapper.sql: id, tank, oil, height_ld, pressure, temperature, happend_time, alarm_id, height_sf1, height_sf2
mapper.insert: insert into alarmrecord (tank, oil, height_ld, pressure, temperature, happend_time, alarm_id, height_sf1, height_sf2) values (#{tank}, #{oil}, #{heightLd}, #{pressure}, #{temperature}, #{happendTime}, #{alarmId}, #{heightSf1}, #{heightSf2})

insert into alarmrecord
id,
tank,
oil,
height_ld,
pressure,
temperature,
happend_time,
alarm_id,
height_sf1,
height_sf2,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{oil,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{heightLd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{pressure,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

mapper.update:
update alarmrecord
tank = #{tank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oil = #{oil,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
height_ld = #{heightLd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pressure = #{pressure,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
happend_time = #{happendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
alarm_id = #{alarmId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
height_sf1 = #{heightSf1,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
height_sf2 = #{heightSf2,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update alarmrecord set tank = #{tank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oil = #{oil,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, height_ld = #{heightLd,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pressure = #{pressure,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, happend_time = #{happendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, alarm_id = #{alarmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, height_sf1 = #{heightSf1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, height_sf2 = #{heightSf2,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
